mapper.insert: INSERT UASP_FileInfos ( File_Id, FileSize, ContentType, Postfix, DiskPath, MD5, IsEncrypted, Status ) VALUES( #{fileId}, #{fileSize}, #{contentType}, #{postfix}, #{diskPath}, #{md5}, #{isEncrypted}, #{status} )
mapper.select:
SELECT t.File_Id, t.FileSize, t.ContentType, t.Postfix, t.DiskPath, t.MD5, t.IsEncrypted, t.Status FROM UASP_FileInfos t
AND ( t.File_Id = #{fileId} )
AND ( t.MD5 = #{md5} )

AND ( t.MD5 = #{md5} )
